TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NextPreviousPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示欄位，這個欄位會在 控制項中顯示巡覽控制項，可讓使用者對資料進行分頁。

span.span: Represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control enable users to page through data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表會顯示在瀏覽控制項的欄位控制項。The class represents a field that displays navigation controls in a control. 可以使用這些瀏覽控制項來逐頁查看資料實作的控制項所顯示的介面，例如控制項。These navigation controls can be used to page through data that are displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 類別會提供按鈕，可讓使用者瀏覽資料的一個頁面的頁面，一次，或是跳到第一個或最後一頁的資料。The class provides buttons that enable users to navigate through the pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data. 您可以自訂的外觀物件使用屬性來設定按鈕的樣式。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the property to set the style of the buttons. 您也可以使用選擇會顯示的按鈕類型的屬性。You can also use the property to choose the type of button that is displayed. 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 您可以隱藏物件存放至藉由設定控制屬性`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 您也可以隱藏個別的按鈕 （第一頁、 前一頁、 下一步 頁面上和最後一頁按鈕），藉由設定， ， ，和屬性`false`。You can also hide the individual buttons (the first-page, previous-page, next-page, and last-page buttons) by setting the , , , and properties to `false`. 控制項可讓您使用指定的每個按鈕的自訂文字， ， ，和屬性。The control enables you to specify custom text for each button by using the , , , and properties. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，您必須提供按鈕將會顯示影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must provide the URL to an image that will be displayed for the button. 您可以藉由設定來設定個別為每個按鈕的影像， ， ，和屬性。You can set images individually for each button by setting the , , , and properties. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，對應的文字屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 比方說，由所指定的文字屬性會顯示為第一頁影像按鈕的替代文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the first-page image button. 支援的瀏覽器工具提示，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。In browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用逐頁查看資料中所顯示的物件控制項。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 這個建構函式通常是當您要將欄位加入動態建立控制項。This constructor is typically used when you are adding fields to a dynamically created control. 若要加入以動態方式為物件控制，建立新物件、 設定其屬性，並將其加入的欄位集合控制項。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式，以動態方式將物件控制項。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ButtonCssClass { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別，用來呈現瀏覽器上頁面巡覽區欄位的按鈕。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to render the buttons of the pager field on the browser.

value.span: 用來呈現用戶端上頁面巡覽區欄位的按鈕之 CSS 類別。

span.span: The CSS class used to render the buttons of the pager field on the client.

value.span: 預設值是空字串，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定按鈕的頁面巡覽區欄位的瀏覽器上呈現的 CSS 類別。Use the property to specify the CSS class to render on the browser for the buttons of the pager field. 這個屬性一律會呈現為類別屬性，不論瀏覽器。This property will always be rendered as the class attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 在瀏覽器不支援 CSS，設定屬性沒有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定按鈕的 CSS 類別物件控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to specify a CSS class for buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定哪一種按鈕會顯示在按鈕欄位的屬性。Use the property to specify which type of button is displayed in a button field. 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型的值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 當設`ButtonType.Image`，您必須設定要使用下表所示的屬性按鈕顯示的影像。When is set to `ButtonType.Image`, you must set the image to display for the buttons by using the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||要為最後一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| 值屬性儲存在 viewstate 中。The value of the property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定影像按鈕會顯示在物件控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`和屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性可指定第一頁按鈕的顯示影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the first-page button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等） 所支援的瀏覽器。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 當以外屬性設定為值`ButtonType.Image`，設定屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的第一頁按鈕影像物件控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the first-page button.

value.span: 預設值為 "First"。

span.span: The default is "First".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定要顯示的第一頁按鈕的文字。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，顯示的影像和屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate，和它可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來自訂頁面巡覽區欄位中的第一頁按鈕的文字控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the first-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 處理 控制項中發生的事件並執行適當的動作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the control and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，以供方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 呼叫它來處理中發生的事件其中一個按鈕控制項內按一下時的物件。It is called to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法會檢查屬性中所包含的物件`e`參數，然後執行適當的動作。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出所提供的按鈕控制項和按一下按鈕時執行的動作。The following table lists the buttons that are provided by the control and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|動作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |第一頁First page||瀏覽至資料的第一頁。Navigates to the first page of data.| |前一頁Previous page||瀏覽至資料的前一頁。Navigates to the previous page of data.| |下一個頁面Next page||巡覽至下一頁資料。Navigates to the next page of data.| |最後一頁Last page||巡覽至最後一頁資料。Navigates to the last page of data.|

span.span: The default is "Last".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定要顯示的最後一頁按鈕的文字。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the last-page button. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，顯示的影像和屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate，和它可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來自訂頁面巡覽區欄位中的最後一頁按鈕的文字控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the last-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/CS/NextPreviousPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldText/VB/NextPreviousPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NextPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定為 物件中下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 為 物件中下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`和屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定顯示下一頁按鈕影像的 URL。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image` and the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the URL to an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 此映像可以是任何檔案格式 （.jpg、.gif、.bmp 等等） 所支援的瀏覽器。This image can be in any file format (.jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on) that is supported in the browser. 當以外屬性設定為值`ButtonType.Image`，設定屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than `ButtonType.Image`, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的下一頁按鈕影像物件控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/CS/NextPreviousPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerFieldUrl/VB/NextPreviousPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The text that is displayed for the next-page button.

value.span: 預設值為 "Next"。

span.span: The default is "Next".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，使用屬性來指定要顯示的 [下一頁] 按鈕的文字。When the property is set to `true`, use the property to specify the text to display for the next-page button. 當屬性設定為`ButtonType.Image`，顯示的影像和屬性做為影像的替代文字。When the property is set to `ButtonType.Image`, the image is displayed and the property acts as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，此文字也會顯示為工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate，和它可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property is stored in viewstate, and it can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來自訂頁面巡覽區欄位中的 [下一頁] 按鈕的文字控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to customize the text for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderDisabledButtonsAsLabels { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 物件是否將停用的按鈕呈現為 控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object.

value.span: 如果停用的按鈕呈現為 控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if disabled buttons are rendered as controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否停用的按鈕會呈現為，來控制物件。Use the property to specify whether disabled buttons are rendered as controls by the object. 按鈕會停用物件時無法執行關聯按鈕的功能。The buttons are disabled by the object when the function associated with the button cannot be performed. 例如，當您在第一頁資料，第一頁和上一頁按鈕會停用。For example, when you are in the first page of data, the first-page and previous-page buttons are disabled. 根據預設，物件使用所指定的控制項類型來呈現已停用的按鈕屬性。By default, the object renders the disabled buttons by using the control type specified by the property. 它也會設定控制項的屬性`false`。It also sets the property of the control to `false`. 當設`true`、物件會使用控制項轉譯已停用的按鈕。When is set to `true`, the object uses the control to render the disabled buttons. 值屬性用來設定屬性控制項。The value of the property is used to set the property of the control. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces are rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否不分行空格 (HTML` `字元) 之間的導覽控制項呈現物件。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character) are rendered between the navigation controls of the object. 您可以設定至`false`如果您需要更充分掌控您要建立具有階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別的配置。You can set to `false` if you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowFirstPageButton { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示第一頁按鈕是否顯示在 物件中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the first-page button is displayed in a object.

value.span: 如果第一頁按鈕顯示在 物件中則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the first-page button is displayed in a object; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可顯示或隱藏第一頁按鈕的物件。Use the property to show or hide the first-page button of a object. 若要顯示的第一頁按鈕，設定屬性`true`。To show the first-page button, set the property to `true`. 這個屬性的值存放在 viewstate 中。The value of this property is stored in viewstate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定應該顯示的第一頁按鈕。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that the first-page button should be displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
